item.title: Here are the main features you’re sacrificing if you buy Apple’s new ultra-thin iPhone Air
item.description: It's the boldest iPhone design in years. But it doesn't come without some compromises.

item.title: e.l.f. Beauty’s CDIO says she’s responsible for AI’s foundation, but that these tools aren’t an IT mandate

item.title: Las Vegas mayor says the city is suffering from a serious drop in Canadian tourists: ‘We need you, and we miss you’
item.description: Shelley Berkley echoed worries from last month when she said traffic from Canada and Mexico has "gone from a faucet to a drip."

item.title: For OpenAI’s chief revenue officer, research chops rather than ‘big marketing efforts’ is the key to winning customers
item.description: At Fortune Brainstorm Tech, OpenAI chief revenue officer Ashley Kramer says keeping rivals at bay will take more than flashy marketing

item.title: Jamie Dimon says economy is ‘weakening’ but he can’t make sense of all the different data: ‘Maybe, one day, AI will fix that problem’
item.description: The economy produced nearly a million less jobs than first thought. "Whether that is on the way to recession or just weakening, I don’t know," Dimon t...
